response.overview: Om keeps having nightmares after coming to a new house and he complains about it to his friend, Prakash who helped him get the new house. Om keeps seeing a wife and her daughter called Insiya and Aliyah in his dreams who are mentally tortured by the husband called Arjun. Om is trying to find out what actually happened in the house with the help of Prakash. They go to meet the broker and get to know that Arjun is the previous owner who sold the house after the death of his wife and daughter and he vanished. Om is terribly affected by the nightmare one night when he saw how they died in the house, thus he realizes what really had happened in the house, but it comes at the cost of losing his sense to know if he is still dreaming or not.
response.title: Princess with The Magic Garland
